tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Naveen is an amazing professional. In a time where world is dealing with such pandemic we need more doctors like him who is an expert in diagnosing and curing health concerns especially in medicine and pulmonary. He takes time with every patient and listens to what they tell him. He runs tests as appropriate. He follows up with patient on regular intervals for their health check up and progress. I’ll recommend Dr Naveen for any healthcare concern and I’m  confident that he will address it to the best of his ability or get to someone who can.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Naveen Kumar is a pulmonologist, and he is the right person to treat a patient of bronchial asthamatics, instead of a medicine specialist.
    He advised me to use a Bipap machine every night, which I did not follow. After getting hospitalized twice due to bronchial exacerbations, I have now finally purchased a new Bipap machine and an oxygen concentrator, and doing well after following Dr Naveen's advice.

review: Dr Elwadhi is a allrounder.  He is Humble and very knowledgeable. He goes to the root cause of disease.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited him a year back when I was in a terrible condition ,wasn't able to speak a word, had breathing problems,cold and cough but after took treatment from him  and now never  experience such bad  sick experience again

review: Rare to find such good doctors. I have consulted many docs for treatment of my kid's asthma but he was the only one to provide **** treatment without any side effects.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Naveen listens to the patient very carefully and he provides best care and treatment. I truly appreciate his services. Doctor, please keep up the good job. *** ** *** **** ************* ** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Naveen is quite polite and professional. He referred multiple tests to rule out the cause of my fever and weakness. Also breathlessness. I would be sharing the reports with him shortly. Highly recommended. Thank You Doctor.

tags: None
review: The doctor is great in his field of expertise that is lungs & respiratory related issues. I just went for reoccurring fever and was looking to have it diagnosed from the perspective of a General Physician. I got medicines & tests done which amounted way more than what a usual treatment to my immediate condition requires.
